casebody.data:
UNITED STATES of America, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. James William ALLEN, Defendant-Appellant. No. 15587. United States Court of Appeals Sixth Circuit. July 8, 1964. Leonard Townsend, Bell & Townsend, Detroit, Mich., for appellant. Lawrence Gubow, U. S. Atty., Sanford Rosenthal, Asst. U. S. Atty., Detroit, Mich., for appellee.

Before WEICK, Chief Judge, EDWARDS, Circuit Judge, and FOX, District Judge.

ORDER.

Upon consideration,

It is ordered that the appeal be hereby dismissed.
